mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( userAccount, realName, nickName, password, role, createDate ) VALUES( #{userAccount}, #{realName}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{role}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE userAccount=#{userAccount}
SELECT u.*, u.userAccount as userAccount FROM user u WHERE userAccount=#{userAccount}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET realName=#{realName}, nickName=#{nickName}, phone=#{phone}, gender= #{gender}, bio=#{bio}, website=#{website} WHERE id=#{id}
